name: api_physics_RaycastHit
description: Structure used to get information back from a raycast.

properties.name: articulationBody
properties.description: The ArticulationBody of the collider that was hit. If the collider is not attached to an articulation body then it is null.

properties.name: barycentricCoordinate
properties.description: The barycentric coordinate of the triangle we hit.

properties.name: colliderEntityId
properties.description: EntityId of the Collider that was hit.

properties.name: distance
properties.description: The distance from the ray's origin to the impact point.

properties.name: lightmapCoord
properties.description: The uv lightmap coordinate at the impact point.

properties.name: normal
properties.description: The normal of the surface the ray hit.

properties.name: point
properties.description: The impact point in world space where the ray hit the collider.

properties.name: rigidbody
properties.description: The Rigidbody of the collider that was hit. If the collider is not attached to a rigidbody then it is null.

properties.name: textureCoord
properties.description: The uv texture coordinate at the collision location.

properties.name: textureCoord2
properties.description: The secondary uv texture coordinate at the impact point.

properties.name: transform
properties.description: The Transform of the rigidbody or collider that was hit.

properties.name: triangleIndex
properties.description: The index of the triangle that was hit.
